Replacer

Replace Text Easily

Please enable JavaScript in your browser, or add this website to your browser's JavaScript whitelist. This website requires JavaScript to work properly.

About

Replacer helps you to replace text easily. You can search for a pattern and replace all texts individually. Just 3 steps and at step 4 you will get your result.

Codes are licensed under MIT.
Documentations are licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0.

You can run it offline. Download the latest release.

GitHub - github.com/paKanhu/replacer

Step 1 - Template

  • Paste the File Content

Paste the template file content below and click on 'Get Template' to proceed to next step.

Step 2 - Template Text

  • Use RegEx

You can use RegEx to search for specific pattern in the template that you want to replace.

Step 3 - Replacement Text

  • Manually Enter the Data

Enter the replacement text for corresponding template text.

    Step 4 - Finished

    Copy the contents of the below text area.
